analysis_age: An emphasis on recent license recipients suggests a bias against older license holders.
text: A&P MECHANICS. 4 TEMP-HIRE or DIRECT-HIRE POSITIONS with Outstanding Benefits. INDUSTRY: AVIATION. LOCATION: DAYTON, OH. PAY RANGE: $23. 30 per hour to start. SUMMARY: Do you hold an A&P license or did you recently earn one? Here is your next outstanding aviation career opportunity! Major Aviation company is seeking Mechanics to troubleshoot, inspect, test, replace, modify, fabricate and repair airframe components, engines and pneumatic, hydraulic and electrical systems on their fleet. All Training will be provided. You will work on CRJ 200 planes. REQUIREMENTS: A&P license required. Recent recipients welcome. Familiarity with precision measuring equipment, pneumatic devices, electrical testing devices, shop equipment, ground support equipment. Good computer skills. Ability to follow aircraft maintenance manuals and FAA Regulation. EOE M/F Vet.

A&P MECHANICS

4 TEMP-HIRE or DIRECT-HIRE POSITIONS with Outstanding Benefits

INDUSTRY: AVIATION

LOCATION: DAYTON, OH

PAY RANGE: $23.30 per hour to start


SUMMARY:

Do you hold an A&P license or did you recently earn one? Here is your next outstanding aviation career opportunity! Major Aviation company is seeking Mechanics to troubleshoot, inspect, test, replace, modify, fabricate and repair airframe components, engines and pneumatic, hydraulic and electrical systems on their fleet. All Training will be provided. You will work on CRJ 200 planes.



REQUIREMENTS:

  • A&P license required. Recent recipients welcome.
  • Familiarity with precision measuring equipment, pneumatic devices, electrical testing devices, shop equipment, ground support equipment.
  • Good computer skills
  • Ability to follow aircraft maintenance manuals and FAA Regulation

EOE M/F Vet
